name: 2D Platformer Prototype
description:
How to play:

  • Jump, shoot and cut your way through 3 different levels and a final boss.
  • Collect coins, kill enemies and avoid dying to get a high score.

Controls:

  • A and D to move the character.
  • W to jump.
  • S to use the sword.
  • Space to shoot ninja stars.
  • ESC to pause.
  • Font - Josefin Sans by Santiago Orozco.
  • Based on the Unity 2D Platformer Tutorial made by gamesplusjames.
